about_the_game:
In Time Avarice, time is both your enemy and ally. Your goal is to destroy crystals to gain time, but beware, letting them disappear will cost you. Each stage offers the chance to buy power-ups, shaping a unique gameplay experience with every run. Use the time you've earned to select different power-ups, each choice impacting your journey. When the clock runs out, time's up.

Unlock new tiers of power-ups through repeated play, enhancing the depth and replayability of each run into this arcade-inspired space humble roguelite.

Main Features

  • Time is a critical resource: Manage it wisely by destroying crystals and choosing power-ups. Don't get greedy!
  • Varied runs: Different power-ups available in each playthrough allow for diverse strategies.
  • Unlockable power-up tiers: Repeated play unlocks more options, adding variety to your game.

There is no escape, just a higher score

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Time is your currency and challenge. Destroy crystals for time; lose it if they vanish. Every run offers new power-ups, with choices that shape your journey. Unlock more as you play, all set in a visually dynamic, arcade-inspired space roguelite.
